title: Nissan car sales in Europe 2003 to 2018
summary: The Number of the men 's lifestyle and entertainment magazine Nissan has dropped significantly in recent years , dropping to just over 200 thousand in 2018 from 477703 % 313437 years earlier .
The magazine reported its highest car Number in 2006 , when an average issue sold 560415 million copies .
Nissan Number numbers – additional information Founded in 1953 by the late Hugh Hefner , Nissan is a men 's lifestyle and entertainment magazine .
gold: This statistic shows the number of cars sold by Nissan in Europe between 2003 and 2018 . European sales of the Nissan cars rose from 400 thousand units sold in 2003 to over 560 thousand units sold by 2017 . In 2018 , there were 487 thousand units of Nissan cars sold in Europe .
